messages.message:
Chat with Yahoo!

Hi Brian, 

This is Arpitha, part of the Talent Acquisition team at Yahoo. I hire for all backend development positions across multiple departments.

Our engineering team looked at your profile and was impressed by your skills sets. We would like to talk to you about an exciting opportunity at Yahoo's Communication team (Mail, Messenger, Flickr, Yahoo Ads...) We are reinventing the way the world will look at mail. There are only a few companies in the world with this kind of scale, impacting 225 millions active mail users per month.

If you are interested, kindly send in your updated resume.
Below are few links on Yahoo!
https://yahooeng.tumblr.com/?soc_src=mail&soc_trk=ma
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=veIqTVQCTrU&feature=youtu.be
http://joinyahoo.tumblr.com/?soc_src=mail&soc_trk=ma
http://blog.flickr.net/en/2016/10/19/were-bringing-you-some-new-features/

Arpitha Nandagopal
408.721.9838
arpithan@yahoo-inc.com
